name: Pod
overview: At last you can see and communicate with that little guy inside your Spectrum! Tell Pod to do something and watch him perform - right in front of your eyes! The ZX Spectrum opened the world of gaming and programming to thousands of British children. While many were content to play purchased games, some were also inspired to try to create their own software, often in the slow and clunky Sinclair BASIC. This is an example of just such a BASIC home-made game.
